nodes.text: X-Wing Rogue Squadron Special is a one-shot issue of the Star Wars Legends comic book series Star Wars: X-Wing Rogue Squadron. It was written by Ryder Windham, illustrated by John Nadeau, and first published on August 1, 1995 by Dark Horse Comics.
The issue was available exclusively as a marketing premium for Apple Jacks cereal, and it was distributed through The Kellogg Company. A digital edition was published by Marvel Comics in 2015.
It's the Battle of Tandankin and the Rogue Squadron aim to win!
